==Trivia==
* {{Transclude|Vestige of Belleau|VestigeBelleauLeitmotif|section=1}}
* {{Transclude|Floating Into Distance|FloatingDistanceLeitmotif|section=1}}
* This track is likely named after ''{{w|Gymnopédies (Satie)|Gymnopédies}}'', a piano composition written by {{w|Erik Satie}}, and ''{{w|Suite_bergamasque#3. Clair de lune|Clair de lune}}'', the third movement of ''Suite bergamasque'' written by {{w|Claude Debussy}}.
